products.title: Splash Ruby Red Panel Blind
products.description: Splash ruby red panel blinds are a fabulous way to dress your window. The saturated red, moisture-resistant fabric is a contemporary and stylish colour choice for any living space. Panel blinds are perfect for patio doors & are available with various control & stacking options, including a wand control making them inherently child safe. As they are a made to measure product, they are covered with their 5 year guarantee giving you that extra peace of mind when purchasing.

products.title: Splash Pebble Grey Panel Blind
products.description: Their moisture-resistant splash pebble grey panel blinds have a stylish and modern feel that will update any space. The soft grey panel is a beautiful, contemporary colour which will brighten, and enrich the space with its warm, saturated shade. As panel blinds reach a massive 5 metres width and 3,. 5 metres drop, this makes it one of the largest blinds we make. A popular blind for large windows and doors, or as a modern room-divider, this blind is not only durable but versatile by design.

products.title: Splash Mid Grey Panel Blind
products.description: Splash mid grey panel blinds are a fabulous way to dress your window. The mid grey fabric is a beuatiful cool grey colour which will compliment most colour palettes within the home and ensure you get a very contemporary modern finish. Panel blinds are perfect for patio doors & are available with a various control & stacking options, including a wand control making them inherently child safe. As they are a made to measure product, they are covered with their 5 year guarantee giving extra peace of mind when investing in this product.

products.title: Splash Grey Panel Blind
products.description: A highly popular range, loved by their customers for its simplicity and value for money, their splash fabrics come in a wide range of colours suitable for all rooms including kitchens and bathrooms. This grey panel blind blends perfectly with any style or taste, whether your decor is on the modern, minimalist side or if you prefer to add bright and bold accessories. This panel blind with accompanying white components and grey fabric colour is a easy and quick way to update your window.

products.title: Splash Dark Grey Panel Blind
products.description: Splash dark grey panel blinds are a fabulous way to dress your window. The dark grey fabric is a contemporary and stylish colour choice for any living space. Panel blinds are perfect for patio doors & are available with various control & stacking options, including a wand control making them inherently child safe. As they are a made to measure product, they are covered with their 5 year guarantee giving you that extra peace of mind when purchasing.
